= Installation Instructions =

== Requirements ==

 * [http://www.libdsl.org/ SDL]
 * [http://www.libdsl.org/projects/SDL_ttf/ SDL_ttf]
 * [http://www.libdsl.org/projects/SDL_image/ SDL_image]
 * [http://www.ferzkopp.net/Software/SDL_gfx-2.0/ SDL_gfx]

[http://www.imagemagick.org/ ImageMagick] is also required for creating PDFs, more specificly the program `convert`. It is not, however, not required for compilation.

== Instalation instructions ==

Once you have all requirements installed, you can just type the basic installation commands of the Unix world:

{{{
$ ./configure
$ make
$ su -
# make install
}}}


== Installing vim support ==

To install vim support, copy the `doc/xsd.vim` file to your `~/.vim/syntax` directory. Then edit your `~/.vimrc` (or `~/.gvimrc`) and add:

{{{
au BufNewFile,BufRead *.xsw source ~/.vim/syntax/xsw.vim
}}}
